Notes.Text:
This update for python fixes the following issues:

The following security vulnerabilities were addressed:

- Add a check to Lib/wave.py that verifies that at least one channel is
  provided. Prior to this, attackers could cause a denial of service via a
  crafted wav format audio file. [bsc#1083507, CVE-2017-18207]
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The Wave_read._read_fmt_chunk function in Lib/wave.py in Python through 3.6.4 does not ensure a nonzero channel value, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero and exception) via a crafted wav format audio file. NOTE: the vendor disputes this issue because Python applications "need to be prepared to handle a wide variety of exceptions."
